title: Secrets
description: What if you were part of a secret so powerful it could change everything? Would you pursue it? Could you survive it? Geneva finally knows the truth about her identity. The Book of Secrets gave her a name, a family and a destiny to fulfill, but it also revealed many more secrets she must uncover. Some are dark and mysterious and beyond her wildest dreams. Now she has to decide who she can trust with her secrets and which of them she must keep to herself. Can you keep a secret? What if you life depended on it?Discover more at www.thegenevaprojectbook.com
author: Christina Benjamin
